name: Thank you email for 5-star review with coupon code
description: Automated email in which you will thank your customer for a product review. It will trigger for 5-star reviews only and contains optional coupon code.

actions.heading_value: No words can describe, how thankful we are!
actions.message_text:
Dear {{ customer.first_name }} We are delighted by your words, and the fact that you gave us a 5-star review! It means a lot to us. In return, we also have something for you. Here's a 10% discount coupon code, which can use in our store for your next purchase.

{{ shop.coupon }}

With warm regards,
actions._action_title: Thank you email for 5 star review
